```{r}
rm(list = ls())

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

hdi <- read.csv("human-development-index.csv")
```

```{r}
hdi <- rename(hdi, "Country" = "Entity")
hdi <- rename(hdi, "Value" = "X..0.1..higher.values.are.better..")

norge <- hdi %>%
  filter(Country == "Norway")


```

```{r}
ggplot(hdi, aes(x = Year, y = Value)) +
  geom_point()
```
